|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = XR5 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = A54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = Type IIIA
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 001b |subvendor_id = 0777 |subdevice_id = 3005 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = SWX-XR5 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:15:6D
|chip1 = Atheros;AR5414;AR5414A-001, Q4H151.1B, 1126, TAIWAN; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MMCX |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 4.9 to 5.9GHz Power Amplifier IC;RFMD;SZA-5044Z;SZA, 5044Z, 15XS;2;InGaP/GaAs;QFN-20;4 mm x 4 mm; |flags = high power |802dot11_protocols = a |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/16/2007 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00CYNJVOM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Additional specifications=== The following specs are per '''UBNT''''s datasheet for the device.
{{802dot11 RxSens|11a |6M=-94 |9M=-93 |12M=-91 |18M=-90 |24M=-86 |36M=-83 |48M=-77 |54M=-74 }} :<small>The Rx Sens specifications for all the XR/SR 2/5 series seem to be identical..</small> '''Transmit Power''' *600mW / 28 dBm (average), 1000mW / 30 dBm (peak)
==Links of Interest== :[http://dl.ubnt.com/xr5_datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
